meanings.definition: Practice or prepare for a performance by repeating movements or lines.
meanings.sent1: The actors were rehearsing their lines for the play.
meanings.sent2: She spends hours rehearsing her dance routine every day.
meanings.sent3: While rehearsing, the actors accidentally switched roles and created a hilarious scene.
meanings.sent4: Rehearsing the steps of success can lead to a flawless performance in real life.
meanings.sent5: Rehearsing diligently can turn a novice into a skilled performer.

meanings.definition: Verb: To practice or prepare for a performance by repeating movements or lines.
meanings.sent1: Before the concert, the band was rehearsing their songs in the studio.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys rehearsing his speech in front of the mirror.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be rehearsing a grand entrance as it walked back and forth on the fence.
meanings.sent4: Rehearsing the recipe multiple times ensures a perfect dish every time.
meanings.sent5: Rehearsing regularly is the key to mastering any skill.
